title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveActiveHurt
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns draw, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. As they turn to leave, a huge shadow falls over the mouth of the cave.

An earthshaking roar echoes through the cave and the enormous body of a bear-like ogre creature stands up. The trapped crew opens fire as the bear-ogre charges in. The bear-ogre, unfazed by the gunfire, slaps the crew aside like a bunch of toys.
As crewmembers try and regain their footing and unleash another volley, the bear-ogre slams one crewmember after another into the walls of the cave.

Severely injured and unable to overcome the power of the mighty beast, the crew makes a disorganized retreat. Weaving through the trees, the crew quickly loses the lumbering beast. Regrouping at the ROV, they climb inside and drive off.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingCaveHurt
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns draw, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. As they turn to leave, a huge shadow falls over the mouth of the cave.

An earthshaking roar echoes through the cave and the enormous body of a bear-like ogre creature stands up. The trapped crew opens fire as the bear-ogre charges in. The bear-ogre, unfazed by the gunfire, slaps the crew aside like a bunch of toys.
As crewmembers try and regain their footing and unleash another volley, the bear-ogre slams one crewmember after another into the walls of the cave.

Severely injured and unable to overcome the power of the mighty beast, the crew makes a disorganized retreat. Weaving through the trees, the crew quickly loses the lumbering beast. Regrouping at the ROV, they climb inside and drive off.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingFight
description: As the crew delves deeper into the woods, they stumble upon the opening to small cave. Freshly slain animals lay scattered about its entrance. As the crew approaches the cave’s entrance, humongous bear-like ogre creature charges from the woods behind them.

It carries a large splintered tree trunk on one if its massive paw hands, and as the crew begins to fire on the creature, it swipes the tree trunk across the crew. The blow sends crewmembers flying in all directions. The scattered crewmembers shakily roll to their feet and begin to run as the bear-ogre gives chase.
The crew runs, weaving in and out between the trees, all the way back to the ROV. They dive in and tear off just as the enormous creature burst out from the trees.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveEmptyFight
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns draw, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. As they turn to leave, a huge shadow falls over the mouth of the cave.

An earthshaking roar echoes through the cave and the enormous body of a bear-like ogre creature stands up. The trapped crew opens fire as the bear-ogre charges in. The bear-ogre, unfazed by the gunfire, slaps the crew aside like a bunch of toys.
As crewmembers try and regain their footing and unleash another volley, the bear-ogre slams one crewmember after another into the walls of the cave.

Severely injured and unable to overcome the power of the mighty beast, the crew makes a disorganized retreat. Weaving through the trees, the crew quickly loses the lumbering beast. Regrouping at the ROV, they climb inside and drive off.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveActiveEdibles2
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns draw, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. As they turn to leave, a huge shadow falls over the mouth of the cave.

An earthshaking roar echoes through the cave and the enormous body of a bear-like ogre creature stands up. The trapped crew opens fire as the bear-ogre charges in. The bear-ogre, unfazed by the gunfire, swipes its tree trunk sized arms into the group.

The group scatters, dodging one swing after another, while unleashing a steady stream of fire at the creature’s massive body. This dance goes on for several minutes until finally, unable to keep up with the agile crew members, the beast falls.

Exhausted but uninjured, the crew begins the lengthy process of butchering the large beast. The huge body provides the crew with ample food. They combine the meat with the meat and berries they already collected and return, packs laden with food, back to the ROV.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothing
description: The crew exits the ROV and enters the woods on foot. They search around for any signs of the creature, but find nothing out of the ordinary.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveActiveEdibles
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns draw, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. As the crew turns to leave, (Name1) lets out a loud sneeze and scares everyone. Everyone laughs and heads back to the ROV with the scraps of meat and berries tucked safely away.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCave
description: The crew exits the ROV and enters the woods on foot. They search around for any signs of the creature, but instead find a patch of ripe berries. They stop and collect the berries, possibly like many of the creatures prey in the past did.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingCave2Leave
description: After collecting all the meat scraps they can, the crew decides they have enough food and they return to the ROV.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingLeave
description: Having second thoughts, the group decides to head back to the ROV.

Everyone laughs and heads back to the ROV with the scraps of meat safely packed away.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingCave
description: As the crew delves deeper into the woods, they stumble upon the opening to small cave. The trees and shrubs around opening are undisturbed and the cave show no obvious signs of habitation.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingCaveEdibles
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns draw, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. As they turn to leave, a huge shadow falls over the mouth of the cave.

An earthshaking roar echoes through the cave and the enormous body of a bear-like ogre creature stands up. The trapped crew opens fire as the bear-ogre charges in. The bear-ogre, unfazed by the gunfire, swipes its tree trunk sized arms into the group.

Exhausted but uninjured, the crew begins the lengthy process of butchering the large beast. The huge body provides the crew with ample food. They pack their bags and return to the ROV, pleased with the day’s events.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingCave2
description: As the crew delves deeper into the woods, they stumble upon the opening to small cave. Freshly slain animals lay scattered about its entrance. Keeping a watchful eye out for any signs of trouble, the crew collects any scraps of good meat they can.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveActiveLeave
description: Content with their handful of berries and bags of meat, the crew decides to turn back to the ROV.

title: Bearfoot
name: Bearfoot
description: While traveling, the crew comes across a wooden post sign with a crudely drawn picture depicting a large, bipedal bear-creature eating a group of fleeing natives. The group assumes it must serve as a warning to the local native inhabitants of the forest. Always looking for an opportunity to gain some food, the crew discuss the possibility of hunt such a creature.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveLeave
description: Having second thoughts, group decides to keep their berries and head home.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveEmptyEdibles
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns drawn, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. Assuming whatever lived inside the cave have long since moved out, the crew heads back to the ROV with nothing more than a meager amount of berries.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveEmptyLeave
description: The group decides they’ll just keep their berries and head home.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveActive
description: As the crew delves deeper into the woods, they stumble upon the opening to small cave. Freshly slain animals lay scattered about its entrance. Keeping a watchful eye out for any signs of trouble, the crew collects any scraps of good meat they can.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingCaveLeave
description: The crew decides they have done enough exploring for one day and they head back to the ROV.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootLeave
description: After discussing their options the group decides against hunting such a potentially dangerous beast.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntNothingCaveNothing
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns draw, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. Assuming whatever lived inside the cave have long since moved out, the crew heads back to the ROV empty handed.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveEmpty
description: As the crew delves deeper into the woods, they stumble upon the opening to small cave. The trees and shrubs around opening are undisturbed and the cave show no obvious signs of habitation.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntFight
description: The crew exits the ROV and enters the woods on foot. They search around for any signs of the creature, but instead find a patch of ripe berries. They stop to collect the berries, and as they do, a huge shadow falls over them.

They turn to see an enormous bear-like ogre towering over them. It lets out an earthshaking roar and the group takes off running.  The group scatters in all directions as the huge creature stomps after them. They sprint, falling over rocks and being whipped by branches, all the way back to the ROV.

title: Bearfoot
name: BearfootHuntCaveEmptyEdibles2
description: They enter the cave cautiously. With guns draw, they probe around the inside the cave. The shallow cave is strewn with bones of various size. The crew thoroughly searching every nook and cranny, but find nothing. As they turn to leave, a huge shadow falls over the mouth of the cave.

An earthshaking roar echoes through the cave and the enormous body of a bear-like ogre creature stands up. The trapped crew opens fire as the bear-ogre charges in. The bear-ogre, unfazed by the gunfire, swipes its tree trunk sized arms into the group.

The group scatters, dodging one swing after another, while unleashing a steady stream of fire at the creature’s massive body. This dance goes on for several minutes until finally, unable to keep up with the agile crew members, the beast falls.

Exhausted but uninjured, the crew begins the lengthy process of butchering the large beast. The huge body provides the crew with ample food. They pack their bags and return to the ROV, pleased with the day’s events.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFindMaybeMany
description: Eventually the steep rock walls widen into an open pool. Water bubbles up from somewhere deep beneath the surface. Surrounding the mouth of the stream are large chunks of crystal, exposed over many years of the waters steady flow. The crew extracts the crystal and head back to the ROV, loot in hand.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFollowMoreNothing
description: Eventually the steep rock walls widen into an open pool. Water bubbles up from somewhere deep beneath the surface. Large rocks are scattered around the mouth of the spring, worn bare from years of flowing water. Unfortunately none of them contain any crystals. Disappointed, the crew returns to the ROV.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFollowFind
description: As they follow the river further upstream the shallow banks gradually turn to steep rock walls. Surprisingly, chucks of crystals are embedded rock along the river’s banks.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFindMaybe
description: As they follow the river further upstream the shallow banks gradually turn to steep rock walls. Finding no additional crystals, the crew continues onwards.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFindMaybeSome
description: Eventually the steep rock walls widen into an open pool. Water bubbles up from somewhere deep beneath the surface. Large rocks are scattered around the mouth of the spring, worn bare from years of flowing water. Unfortunately none of them contain any crystals. Disappointed, the crew returns to the ROV.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFollowFindMany
description: After dislodging the embedded chunks, the crew continues further upstream until they arrive at the mouth of the spring. Water bubbles up from somewhere deep beneath the surface. Large rocks are scattered around the mouth of the spring, worn bare from years of flowing water. Large chunks of crystals protrude from between the rocks and after a few minutes of work, the crew extracts them. Bags heavy with crystals, the crew heads back to the ROV.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFollow
description: They follow the river, checking through the gravely rocks that make up the riverbed, but don’t find any crystals.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFollowMoreFind
description: Eventually the steep rock walls widen into an open pool. Water bubbles up from somewhere deep beneath the surface. Unexpectedly large chunks of crystal surround the mouth of the spring, exposed over many years of the waters steady flow. The crew knock the crystals loose and head back to the ROV, loot in hand.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFindMoreSome
description: Eventually the steep rock walls widen into an open pool. Water bubbles up from somewhere deep beneath the surface. Large rocks are scattered around the mouth of the spring, worn bare from years of flowing water. Amazingly, none of them contain any crystals. The crew return the ROV, disappointed, but not empty handed.

title: Carving Stream
name: Stream
description: While the crew is traveling, they spot a shallow stream carving a path through a rocky mountain pass and decide to follow it upstream in hopes of finding crystals. The crew makes their way down to the stream and begins following its winding path.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFindMore
description: As they follow the river further upstream the shallow banks gradually turn to steep rock walls. The crew finds even more crystals embedded in the rock along the river’s banks. They break them free and continue onwards, hoping to find the source of the crystals.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFollowFindSome
description: After dislodging the embedded chunks, the crew continues further upstream until they arrive at the mouth of the spring. Years of flowing water have worn the rocks around the spring smooth. Unfortunately the crew doesn’t find anymore crystals amongst the smooth rocks, so they head back to the ROV.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFollowMore
description: The crew follow the river further upstream. The walls begin to turn from shallow banks to steep rock walls, but there’s still no crystal to be found.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFind
description: It doesn’t take long for them to notice a few stray crystals amongst the gravely rock that makes up the riverbed. They scoop them up as they find them and hope they’re a sign of more to come.

title: Carving Stream
name: StreamFindMoreMany
description: Eventually the steep rock walls widen into an open pool. Water bubbles up from somewhere deep beneath the surface. Large rocks are scattered around the mouth of the spring, worn bare from years of flowing water. Large chunks of crystals protrude from between the rocks and after a few minutes of work, the crew extracts them. Bags heavy with crystals, the crew heads back to the ROV.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathFindNothing
description: As they head deeper into the woods the parts stop, but the occasional broken tree remains.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathNothing
description: After traveling for a few minutes they still haven’t found anything and the path becomes harder to follow.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathFindMoreOkay
description: The crew spends many hours searching the woods for any sign of a crash, but are unable to uncover the main wreck or any indication of an impact crater. Perplexed and disappointed the crew heads back to the ROV.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathNothing2Parts
description: Suddenly the trees give way to a large clearing and, much to the crew’s surprise, the burnt shell of a Ya492 light frigate: a small, lightly armored, combat vessel often used for hit and runs by pirates due to its light weight and mobility.

Atmospheric entry, the crash, and overall decay made the small vessel almost unrecognizable. While it’s unclear how or why the crash is here, the overgrowth and weathering would indicate it has been sitting for many years.

The crew cuts through the vines and overgrowth and begins the extensive procedure of extracting any valuables from the wreckage. Much of the ship is unrecoverable ruins, but nevertheless the crew manages to extract a fine mound of pieces and parts.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathNothing2Nothing
description: Eventually they stumble upon a large crater, but there’s nothing inside it. Whatever was inside was either totally incinerated as it landed or the natives already pick the area clean a long time ago.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathFindNothingOkay
description: Eventually they stumble upon a large crater, but there’s nothing inside it. Whatever was inside was either totally incinerated as it landed or the natives already pick the area clean a long time ago. The disappointed crew heads back to the ROV with only a few scrap parts, not the treasure trove they expected.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: Path
description: As the crew is stopped from a quick rest-stop they see a faint path of broken trees, so overgrown it’s hard to make out. Expecting to find some parts, they decide to follow it and see where it leads.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathNothingFindGood
description: Suddenly the trees give way to a large clearing and, much to the crew’s surprise, the burnt shell of a Ya492 light frigate: a small, lightly armored, combat vessel often used for hit and runs by pirates due to its light weight and mobility.

Atmospheric entry, the crash, and overall decay made the small vessel almost unrecognizable. While it’s unclear how or why the crash is here, the overgrowth and weathering would indicate it has been sitting for many years.

The crew cuts through the vines and overgrowth and begins the extensive procedure of extracting any valuables from the wreckage. Much of the ship is unrecoverable ruins, but nevertheless the crew manages to extract a fine mound of pieces and parts.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathFindMore
description: As the crew head deeper into the woods they start to see more broken trees and begin to find larger chunks of metal debris. Feeling they are close to the source, they collect what they can and press on.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathFindMoreGood
description: Suddenly the trees give way to a large clearing and, much to the crew’s surprise, the burnt shell of a Ya492 light frigate: a small, lightly armored, combat vessel often used for hit and runs by pirates due to its light weight and mobility.

Atmospheric entry, the crash, and overall decay made the small vessel almost unrecognizable. While it’s unclear how or why the crash is here, the overgrowth and weathering would indicate it has been sitting for many years.

The crew cuts through the vines and overgrowth and begins the extensive procedure of extracting any valuables from the wreckage. Much of the ship is unrecoverable ruins, but nevertheless the crew manages to extract a fine mound of pieces and parts.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathNothingFind
description: As the crew heads deeper into the woods they start to see more broken trees and begin to find large chunks of metal debris. Feeling they are close to the source, they collect what they can and press on.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathNothingFindOkay
description: The crew spends many hours searching the woods for any sign of a crash, but are unable to uncover the main wreck or any indication of an impact crater. Perplexed and disappointed the crew heads back to the ROV.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathNothing2
description: As they head deeper into the woods they spot more broken trees, but they still haven’t found any parts or wreckage.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathFindNothingGood
description: Suddenly the trees give way to a large clearing and, much to the crew’s surprise, the burnt shell of a Ya492 light frigate: a small, lightly armored, combat vessel often used for hit and runs by pirates due to its light weight and mobility.

Atmospheric entry, the crash, and overall decay made the small vessel almost unrecognizable. While it’s unclear how or why the crash is here, the overgrowth and weathering would indicate it has been sitting for many years.

The crew cuts through the vines and overgrowth and begins the extensive procedure of extracting any valuables from the wreckage. Much of the ship is unrecoverable ruins, but nevertheless the crew manages to extract a fine mound of pieces and parts.

title: Faintest of Paths
name: PathFind
description: After traveling for a few minutes the crew starts to come across a few small pieces of metal scrap, confirming what they suspected.

title: Power Problem
name: PowerAutoHurt
description: (He1) tries to run an auto fix from inside the ROV, but the batteries' temperature continues to rise. In a last ditch effort, (Name1) grabs (his1) tools and runs outside. (He1) fights against the scalding temperatures, trying to fix the batteries manually before it's too late. The sirens finally fade as the temperatures drop. (Name1) collapses to the ground, burned and exhausted.

title: Power Problem
name: Power
description: The ROV lumbers lazily along when suddenly, the crew is startled by a loud warning coming from the ROV subsystem control panel. (Name1) Rushes over to the screen to discover the batteries are dangerously hot and on the brink of catastrophic failure.

(Name1) knows (he1) must act fast to have any hope of saving the batteries. With the batteries temperature skyrocketing, working on the batteries is extremely dangerous, maybe even fatal. (Name1) has two options: (he1) can attempt to fix the problem manually from outside, which is likely to fix the problem, but is also dangerous or (he1) can run an auto fix from the console inside the ROV, which is safer, but less likely to fix the problem.

title: Power Problem
name: PowerManualHurt
description: (He1) tries to fix the batteries manually, working outside on the batteries, sweating and curing as the temperature continues to rise. (He1) feels (his1) skin beginning to burn, but (he1)'s too close to stop now. Finally, the sirens fade and the temperature drops. (Name1) collapses to the ground, burned and exhausted.

title: Power Problem
name: PowerManualLoseEnergy
description: (He1) tries to fix the batteries manually, applying every fix (he1) can think of, but the temperature keep rising out of control.

title: Power Problem
name: PowerAutoLosePower
description: (He1) tries to run an auto fix from inside the ROV, but the batteries' temperature continues to rise.

title: Power Problem
name: PowerManualNothing
description: (He1) tries to fix the batteries manually, working outside on the batteries, sweating and cursing, until at last the warning sirens fade and the temperature drops.

title: Power Problem
name: PowerAutoNothing
description: (He1) tries to run an auto fix from inside the ROV and as the batteries reach critical mass, the auto fix completes. Miraculously, the sirens fade and the temperature drops. Somehow the auto fix worked.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkSuccess3
description: They work on the batteries for a few minutes, reconfiguring, rewiring, and rearranging, until at last, they’re satisfied. (Name1) runs some quick test from inside the ROV, and it shows a substantial improvement to the energy output. Hoping to increase their power production even further, the crew turns their attention to the solar panels.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkSuccess2
description: They work on the batteries for a few minutes, reconfiguring, rewiring, and rearranging, until at last, they’re satisfied. (Name1) runs some quick test from inside the ROV, but it shows no energy has been gained. Disheartened, the crew turns to the solar panels as another means to provide the much needed energy boost.

title: System Rework
name: Rework
description: The crew decides to rework energy generating subsystems in an attempt to generate some additional power.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkFail3Good
description: They modify the solar panels, adjust their gradient, and change their wiring around. Once their contented with their work, they head inside the ROV and run some test. After a few minutes of processing, test results still show a sizable growth to power output from the batteries in addition to a considerable increase from the solar panels!

title: System Rework
name: ReworkSuccess3Okay
description: They modify the solar panels, adjust their gradient, and change their wiring around. Once their contented with their work, they head inside the ROV and run some test. After a few minutes of processing, test results still show a significant increase to power output from the batteries, but unfortunately, no additional increase from the solar panels.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkSuccess2Good
description: They modify the solar panels, adjust their gradient, and change their wiring around. Once their contented with their work, they head inside the ROV and run some test. After a few minutes of processing, test results show a considerable increase to power output from the solar panels!

title: System Rework
name: ReworkFail3
description: They work on the batteries for a few minutes, reconfiguring, rewiring, and rearranging, until at last, they’re satisfied. (Name1) runs some quick test from inside the ROV, and it shows a substantial improvement to the energy output. Hoping to increase their power production even further, the crew turns their attention to the solar panels.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkFail2
description: They work on the batteries for a few minutes, reconfiguring, rewiring, and rearranging, until at last, they’re satisfied. (Name1) runs some quick test from inside the ROV, but it shows no energy has been gained. Disheartened, the crew turns to the solar panels as another means to provide the much needed energy boost.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkFail
description: They begin by working on the subsystem’s display console inside the ROV. They try switching several setting and redefining different parameters, but it doesn’t result in any energy gain, so the crew heads outside to work on the batteries.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkSuccess
description: They begin by working on the subsystem’s display console inside the ROV. They try switching several setting and redefining different parameters. After running a few test, screens show a slight power increase. The crew heads outside to work on the batteries, hoping to boost the power output even further.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkFail2Good
description: They modify the solar panels, adjust their gradient, and change their wiring around. Once their contented with their work, they head inside the ROV and run some test. After a few minutes of processing, test results show a considerable increase to power output from the solar panels!

title: System Rework
name: ReworkFail2Nothing
description: They modify the solar panels, adjust their gradient, and change their wiring around. Once their contented with their work, they head inside the ROV and run some test. After a few minutes of processing, test results still show no change to the energy output.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkSuccess3Good
description: They modify the solar panels, adjust their gradient, and change their wiring around. Once their contented with their work, they head inside the ROV and run some test. After a few minutes of processing, test results still show a sizable growth to power output from the batteries in addition to a considerable increase from the solar panels!

title: System Rework
name: ReworkSuccess2Okay
description: They modify the solar panels, adjust their gradient, and change their wiring around. Once their contented with their work, they head inside the ROV and run some test. After a few minutes of processing, test results show no additional change to the energy output.

title: System Rework
name: ReworkFail3Okay
description: They modify the solar panels, adjust their gradient, and change their wiring around. Once their contented with their work, they head inside the ROV and run some test. After a few minutes of processing, test results still show a significant increase to power output from the batteries, but no additional increase from the solar panels.

title: The Gift
name: GiftOpenKeep
description: The group decides (Name2) is right, they shouldn't waste their time searching treasure. They pack the map back into its box and store it away for later.

title: The Gift
name: Gift
description: While the crew is stopped for a quick stretch break, (Name1) decides to have a quick snack. After rustling through the food storage, (he1) picks out a nice ripe piece of fruit and finds a comfy log to sit on while (he1) eats. As (he1) finishes (his1) fruit (he1) turns to toss the pit into the woods and finds (him1)self face to face with a tiny impish creature holding a small wooden box. As he grabs for his pistol, the creature quickly places the box down and scampers off.

Perplexed, (Name1) picks up the box and examines it. The ornate wooden box is inscribed with simplistic pictures depicting tribal life. The lid of the box is held in place by a twine-like string. (Name1) brings the box back to the crew to discuss what to do with it.

title: The Gift
name: GiftDont
description: Unsure of what lies inside, the crew is apprehensive to open the small box. They decide to keep the box to use for trade. Surely some other natives will be interested in it.

title: The Gift
name: GiftOpenFollowHurt
description: The group spends the next few hours traveling from landmark to landmark, until at last they arrive at the location marked by the unrecognizable shape. Next to the large unrecognizable symbol on the map is smaller one, shaped like a fat lightning bolt.

The group searches around for something that matches the description, but all they see are rocks and trees. The disheartened group turns to leave, frustrated over wasted time, when they spot a large crack in a nearby rock face. The crack is deep and narrow, widening at the base just enough for someone to squeeze in.

(Name1) disappears into the rock crevasse, reappearing a moment later holding a large empty sack. Disappointed by this discovery, the group turns to leave, and finds themselves surrounded by a group of tree-like natives. Caught out in the open, the crew is unable to escape the first volley of arrows. The injured crew runs for the trees, as more arrows rain down around them. They zigzag through the trees until they come to a banks of a deep river. Unable to turn back, the crew jumps into the icy water below.
Sometime later, they wash ashore downstream, injured, tired, and cold. Using their now waterlogged bark map, they backtrack their way back to the ROV and collapse inside.

title: The Gift
name: GiftOpenFollowGood
description: The group spends the next few hours traveling from landmark to landmark, until at last they arrive at the location marked by the unrecognizable shape. Next to the large unrecognizable symbol on the map is smaller one, shaped like a fat lightning bolt.

The group searches around for something that matches the description, but all they see are rocks and trees. The disheartened group turns to leave, frustrated over wasted time, when they spot a large crack in a nearby rock face. The crack is deep and narrow, widening at the base just enough for someone to squeeze in.

(Name1) slides into the rock crevasse and disappears inside. (He1) reappears a moment later holding a large sack. Inside the sack is: a small amount of food, some simple tools, a few miscellaneous doodads, and a pair of fine fur clothes. Pleased with their discovery, (Name1) repacks the back, throws it over (his1) shoulder, and the crew begins the long journey back to the ROV.

title: The Gift
name: GiftOpen
description: The group decides to open the box. They carefully unravel the string latch and cautiously open the lid. Inside is a small rolled up piece of thin bark. (Name1) unrolls the bark paper and discovers a crude map has been drawn on the inside. The crew recognizes some of the more obvious land marks, such as a large arch shaped rock and the small weaving river nearby. A small path is outlined on the map that ends with an unrecognizable shape, marking something of importance. (Name1) suggests following the map to see where it leads, but (Name2) proposes the group keep the map to trade to the natives for something more practical.

title: The Runaway
name: RunawayRevealRiders
description: She struggles, trying to escape the big natives grasp, kicking hard until, at last, she slips free. She runs towards the trees with the second native close behind. The first native scrambles to his mount and races after them and they all disappear into the forest.

title: The Runaway
name: RunawayDoNothing
description: The crew, armed only with their sidearms, tensely watch the circling natives.

title: The Runaway
name: RunawayRevealInjured
description: At first she struggles, but quickly stops, seemingly resigned to the fact that she can't overpower her captors. She stares hatefully into the eyes of the crew and shouts unintelligible words at them.

As the muscular native begins to tie a rope around the hands of the thin native, she lashes out. Grabbing the natives exposed sword, she stabs (Name1) in the side and pounces on (Name2), clawing (him2) to the ground. As she turns to the rest of the crew, the second big native fires an arrow and strikes her down.

As the crew rushes to their wounded comrades, the big native collects the body of the, now dead, native and toss it on the back of his great beast. The second big native grunts and tosses a large sack on the ground in front of the crew. The pair turn on their mounts, let out a grunt, and ride off.
Once the riders are out of sight and the crew's injured are tended to, they untie the bag's thick leather straps and open it up to reveal an assortment of different meats and berries!

title: The Runaway
name: RunawayDoNothingMinorHurt
description: One of the large natives dismounts from this wolf-beast and reaches under the ROV. He grabs the tiny native by her ankles and drags her out from underneath it. She kicks and scratches, trying to free herself from his grasp as he unsheathes a long blade that hangs from his belt. He swings back the long blade, but as he brings it down a shot rings out. He turns to (Name1) as (his1) sidearm fire three more shots into the big native's chest. The native's wolf-beast lets out a howl and charges into the crew.

All hell breaks loose as the remaining native fires a volley of arrows into the crew and they fire back. Bullets fly in all directions as the rampaging wolf-beast barrels through the crew, snapping its massive jaws at anything and everything.

The skirmish last only a few minutes in total and as the dust settles the crew assess battlefield. Near the front of the ROV, one native lies dead atop the squirming smaller native. His beast mount lying a few feet away, surrounded by the battered crew. A few yards from the crew rests the second native and his mount, both riddled with bullet holes.

The smaller native, still squirming beneath the dead native's large body, fearfully glances around at the crew. (Name1) rolls the large native's body off her, and she scrambles to her feet. She hurriedly runs to the bodies of the dead natives and begins rifling through their belongings, all the while keeping her eyes glued to the motionless crew.

After grabbing a few things she stops. Timidly approaching the crew, she reaches out and lightly touches (Name1)'s hand. Then she turns to the woods and runs off, quickly vanishing into its tangled branches.

title: The Runaway
name: RunawayDoNothingWanderer
description: The riders circle back to the front of the ROV. For a moment they just sit, staring at each of the crew members one at a time, as if sizing them up. Finally they turn and ride off into the forest. The crew breathes a sigh of relief.

The crew peeks under the ROV to see what has become of the remaining native. As they do, she dashes out, past the crew, and runs to the woods. Just before she enters the trees, she stops, briefly looks back at the crew with a look of fear and gratitude in her eyes, and then she's gone.

title: The Runaway
name: Runaway
description: The ROV lurches to a sudden stop as a thin figure emerges from the sea of trees ahead. It's a scrawny native, weak and dirty, clothed only in patches of mud and miscellaneous flakes of earthy debris. She darts towards the ROV and dives underneath it.

Just as the perplexed crew begins to emerge from the ROV, two more natives appear. Sitting atop two huge wolf-like beast, their muscular bodies clothed in thick fur robes. They boldly approach the ROV, seemingly unconcerned by the presence of the unfamiliar crew.
They begin to slowly circle the crew, looking all around as though they are searching for something they lost. They grumble to each other in an indiscernible language.

title: The Runaway
name: RunawayRevealEdibles
description: She struggles, trying to escape the big natives grasp, but it's no use. He ties her arms and legs with a heavy leather cord and throws her over the back of his wolf beast.

He climbs aboard his mount as the second large native slowly approaches the crew. He glares down at them for a moment, then he pulls a large sack from the side of his great beast and tosses at the feet of the crew. The natives let out a loud call, spur on their mounts, and ride away.

Once the riders are out of sight the crew unties the bag's thick leather straps and opens it. The bag is full to the brim with an assortment of all kinds of edibles, some which the crew has never seen before. Together they drag the bag to their food storage and toss it inside!

title: The Runaway
name: RunawayDoNothingMajorHurt
description: One of the large natives dismounts from this wolf-beast and reaches under the ROV. He grabs the tiny native by her ankles and drags her out from underneath it. She kicks and scratches, trying to free herself from his grasp as he unsheathes a long blade that hangs from his belt. He swings back the long blade and as he brings it down, (Name1) dives to stop him.

Too slow to stop the native, his blade slices through the smaller native's body as (Name1) tackles him to the ground. All hell breaks loose as the second natives fire a volley of arrows into the crew and they unholster their sidearms and fire back. As (Name1) wrestles with the first native, his beast mount roars and barrels into the crew, sending them flying in all directions.

The skirmish only last a few minutes, but when it's done the natives lay dead and the crew lies scattered across the battlefield, beaten but alive. As the crew recovers, they search through the native's bodies, collecting anything of value. Much of their supplies are ruined from the firefight, but the crew recovers what they can and loads it into the ROV.

title: The Runaway
name: RunawayReveal
description: (Name1) gestures towards space underneath the ROV and one of the big natives nods slowly back and dismounts from his beast. He reaches underneath the ROV and drags the scrawny native, kicking and screaming, out by her ankles.

title: TheGift
name: GiftOpenFollow
description: The group decides (Name1) is right, they pack their bags and head out on foot towards the first landmark indicated on the map.

title: Thief in the Night
name: ThiefRaid
description: After discussing their options, the crew decides to raid the native's encampment to attempt recover their lost supplies. (Name1) suggest an aggressive frontal assault on the camp, go in guns blazing, and carve a path to the strong house before the natives can seal themselves inside, but (Name2) has other ideas. (He1) proposes a silent infiltration, quietly sneak into the camp, and catch the natives off guard.

The crew estimates the frontal assault has a lower chance of successfully recovering the supplies, but provides a safer extraction if things go wrong.  The silent infiltration, on the other hand, has a higher chance of supply recovery, but leaves the crew dangerously exposed of they're caught.

title: Thief in the Night
name: ThiefRaidSilentFail
description: The crew decides on the plan of silent infiltration and makes their way to the native's encampment just as the sun begins to set. They watch the natives from a patch of trees only a few yards from the encampment. Small wooden huts, surrounded by a small makeshift wall, are scattered haphazardly around the sturdy walls of the strong house. Just as the sun sinks below the horizon, a small patrol of natives wander dangerously close to the hidden crew. They lie in wait until the patrol passes, then they soundlessly creep towards walls of the little camp.

Hopping over the makeshift wall, the crew begins to make their way towards the strong house. Keeping low and sticking to the shadows, they creep ever closer. As they near the entrance of the strong house they stop. The large wooden doors are open and inside they can make out the silhouettes of the natives within, most likely helping themselves to the crew's food and drink.

Without a sound, the crew makes their way towards open doors of the strong house. The crew is just feet from the entrance, when both doors suddenly slam shut. Arrows rain down on the crew as they dive for cover. Spearmen charge the now separated crewmembers as another volley of arrows shower over them.

The disjointed crewmembers attempt to hold their ground, killing one spearmen after another. Some of the crew members stand firm, firing their rifles into thinning groups of archers and spearmen scattered around the camp, while others are taken to the ground, fighting hand and foot against their attackers.

Finally, suffering too many losses, the natives pull back into the protection of the strong house. The badly injured team can't risk another engagement. Having sacrificed too much to leave empty handed, the crew grabs whatever supplies they can as they make their way through the camp and back to the shelter of the ROV.

title: Thief in the Night
name: ThiefRaidSilentBad
description: The crew decides on the plan of silent infiltration and makes their way to the native's encampment just as the sun begins to set. They watch the natives from a patch of trees only a few yards from the encampment. Small wooden huts, surrounded by a small makeshift wall, are scattered haphazardly around the sturdy walls of the strong house. Just as the sun sinks below the horizon, a small patrol of natives wander dangerously close to the hidden crew. They lie in wait until the patrol passes, then they soundlessly creep towards walls of the little camp.

Hopping over the makeshift wall, the crew begins to make their way towards the strong house. Keeping low and sticking to the shadows, they creep ever closer. As they near the entrance of the strong house they stop. The large wooden doors are open and inside they can make out the silhouettes of the natives within, most likely helping themselves to the crew's food and drink. As the silhouettes inside fade away, the crew slides from behind their cover, cross the path leading into the strong house, and silently slips inside.

In the center of the single room strong house is a large pile of stolen supplies. Some of the supplies they recognize as their own, but others they don't. A handful of natives shuffle though the boxes and bags that fill the room, unaware of the crew's presence.

(Name1) slam the doors shut and bars them, as the rest of the crew showers the room with rifle fire. It doesn't take long before waves of enraged natives begin to beat at walls and doors as the crew fires at them through the crude arrow slits that line the walls of the strong house.

With superior firepower and superior positioning, the battle doesn't last long. Unable to breech the thick walls of the strong house and with mounting casualties, the natives quickly begin to scatter into the woods. Fearing a counter attack, some of the crew stays to guard the loot, while others shuttle the supplies to the ROV. Once the supplies are all safely inside the ROV, the crew climbs aboard, and the ROV rolls onwards.

title: Thief in the Night
name: ThiefAbandonHurt
description: Unwilling to risk their lives over some stolen supplies, the group decides to press on without them, but (Name1) calls them cowards and runoff towards the camp alone. Unsure of what to do next, the crew waits for (his1) return. As minutes turn to hours, the crew worries they may not see (him) again.

Suddenly, (he1) appears, loaded down with loot and running fast. (He1) throws the loot into the ROV, shouting for them to go, as (he1) climbs inside. The ROV roars to life, as natives pour out of the tree line towards the ROV.

The crew fires into the advancing wall of natives and the natives respond with a barrage of arrows. The natives surround the ROV, bashing it with rocks and tearing apart anything they can. As the ROV pulls free, the crew struggles to dislodge the few determine natives that manage to hang on. Finally, the last of the angry natives tumble loose and the steady stream of arrows slows to a stop.

title: Thief in the Night
name: Thief
description: After stopping for a short rest, the crew emerges from the ROV to realize they've been robbed! A huge amount of the crew's supplies have been stolen from the external storage compartments. They waste no time scouring the mountains for clues as to the whereabouts of their supplies and it doesn't take long before they spy the twinkle of distant campfires in a shallow river valley. (Name1) volunteers to scout it out. He quickly packs his supplies and heads out.

It's not long before (Name1) returns. (He1) tells the crew that their supplies are being stored in the strong house of a small native encampment and believes that the crew should be able to overcome its defense and recover the supplies without too much trouble.

title: Thief in the Night
name: ThiefAbandonLoseLarge
description: Unwilling to risk their lives over some stolen supplies, the group decides to press on, leaving the supplies behind.

title: Thief in the Night
name: ThiefRaidBad
description: Deciding on the frontal assault the crew leaves the ROV and approaches the native's encampment at sunset. They hide and wait in a patch of trees only a few yards from the makeshift wooden walls that surround the native's encampment. As the sun sets below the horizon, they spring from the trees, and charge into the camp.

They cut through scattered wood huts, firing at any unsuspecting native that emerges, but as they near the strong house, a horde of angry natives surround the group. As they become bogged down in a close quarter's battle, the large wooden gates of the strong room slide closed.

Some of the natives rush the group with spears, while other rain arrows from a distance with deadly accuracy. Spotting the closed gates and badly outnumbered, the group retreats and bunkers in amongst the small wooden huts. Reluctant to leave the camp empty handed, the crew fights off one spear wielding native after another.

Eventually the crew repels the attacking natives, forcing them to retreat into the strong house, but they are unable to breech the strong house's study walls. Exhausted from the lengthy battle, the crew collects any scrap of supplies they can find around the camp and among the many scattered bodies and withdrawals to the ROV.

title: Thief in the Night
name: ThiefRaidFail
description: Leaving the ROV, the crew approaches the native's encampment at sunset. They hide and wait in a patch of trees only a few yards from the makeshift wooden walls that surround the native's encampment. As the sun sets below the horizon, they spring from the trees, and charge into the camp.

The unsuspecting natives emerge from their wooden huts, only to be cut down in hail of gunfire. The natives rush to the agape doors of the strong house, but so to the charging crew. Arrows rain down on the crew as they reach the strong house just as the natives slowly slide the heavy wooden doors close. (Name1) shoulders into the thick doors, crashing through them and into a group of surprised natives on the other side. The crew follows close behind, climbing over the splintered remains of a wooden barricade, they unload their rifles into the group of natives by the door as more natives emerge.

It doesn't take long before the crew cuts down the rest of the thieving natives hiding inside the sturdy walls of the strong house. A large pile of stolen goods lie stacked in the center of the single room strong house, some belong to the crew and some do not. The crew takes turns guarding their newly recovered loot while they transfer it, pile by pile, back to the ROV. Once all the supplies are secured, the crew climbs aboard, and the ROV journeys on.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareGreenFail
description: The crew reaches the red army just as it finishes chopping a hole into one of the walls of the green settlement. They fire on the red raiders, gunning many of them down, but for each one they kill, two more appear. The groups exchange volley back and forth. The crew has the firepower, but the natives have the numbers and the crew is quickly overwhelmed. Their forced to make a retreat under a hail of musket fire. The injured crew limps away, looking back as the enter the tree line to see the settlement engulfed in flames.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareRedHelpFlee
description: Worried about friendly fire, the group stays close the to the red native’s leaders, serving as a makeshift body guard as they push through the streets of wood and thatch houses.

As the marauding red soldiers fan out through the city more green soldiers appear, seemingly on the roof of every building as more overflow into the streets. The green defenders rain down fire from all directions and one of the red leads falls. As the red soldiers begin to thin, the remaining leaders bark frantic orders and the wave of soldiers begins surging slowly back out of the green controlled settlement.

Sometime later, safely outside the walls of the settlement, the crew regroups with the leaders of the red army and they present them with a chest full of goods, most likely some form of payment for their bravery. The crew graciously accepts and tots their newly acquired loot back to the ROV for safe keeping.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareGreenHelpDefend
description: The settlement is filled with thatch and wood housed of different sizes. Green soldiers fire down on the red natives that are spread throughout the narrow streets. Many of the green natives spot the crew and, puzzled at first, begin to aim their muskets at them, but stop when they see the crew killing one red native after another as they move through the streets towards the large keep.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareRedFail
description: As the crew approaches the natives, some of them turn, startled with guns raised. The crew holds their hands out and signal that they mean no harm, shooting up at the walls of the green stronghold and pointing aggressively.

Somehow it seems their message works and red leaders bark unknown orders to their troops and they let the crew pass into the crowd. The red natives are simply chopping through the wall, as the green natives shoot from above. The crew joins in and with a few minutes a small gap has formed at the base of one of the walls. As the gap grows, the red natives start seeping into the settlement and, as they do, the green natives pour a large cauldron of boiling liquid all over the invading attackers.

Many of the crew are splattered as burning liquid rains down on the natives. As the red assault falters, a wave of green natives flood out of the gap and overwhelm the scalded red warriors. As one group of green natives flood out, another fires from above, peppering the crew with gunfire. The red natives run for cover and the group follows, nearly being trampled in the process. As the red army disperses, the injured crew limp back to the ROV and slump inside.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareRedHelpAssaultGood
description: After what seems like hours, the reinforced wood door splinters open and the battle spreads into the keep. As the crew enters the innermost chamber, a small squad of green defends rush the red leads. One of the leaders is shot, but the crew manages to gun down the green soldiers before they can finish the job.

Moments later, once the keep is securely under red control, the injured red leader summons one of his servants too him. He whispers something to the servant and he hurries off, returning moments later dragging a huge chest full of supplies over to the crew. The surprised crew looks to the injured red leader who sweeps his arm in a nods. The group scoops up the hefty chest and rushes off before he can change his mind.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareRedHelp
description: As the crew approaches the natives, some of them turn, startled with guns raised. The crew holds their hands out and signal that they mean no harm, shooting up at the walls of the green stronghold and pointing aggressively.

Somehow it seems their message works and red leaders bark unknown orders to their troops and they let the crew pass into the crowd. The red natives are simply chopping through the wall, as the green natives shoot from above. The crew joins in and with a few minutes a small gap has formed at the base of one of the walls. As the gap grows, the red natives start pouring into the settlement and the crew flows close behind.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareNopeGreenAmbush
description: After an hour or so of sieging, the army of red natives break down the walls and flood inside. The sounds of battle rage out of sight of the crew. Within a few minutes flames start to appear above the remaining walls and groups of green natives run out as red natives chase after. On that note, crew heads back to the ROV and as they pull away, a group of bloodied and charred green natives stumble by. The crew tries not to make eye contact as they slowly drive past.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareRedHelpAssaultOkay
description: As the red soldiers batter away at the keeps doors, large groups of green reinforcements appear to the right and left of the attackers. As they close in on the red army the leaders order a retreat and the army begins to surge outwards. As the reach the exit gap, a small band of green soldiers cut the crew and the red leaders off. The crew drives forward and into the group of green soldiers, firing as they go.

The crew makes short work of the green soldiers and regroup outside the walls of the settlement with the remaining red leaders. One of the red leaders signal to his servant and then sends him away. He returns shortly, dragging a large chest full of loot and places it at the crew’s feet. The group cordially accepts and hauls their new loot of to their ROV for safe keeping.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareNopeRedAmbush
description: After an hour or so of sieging, the army of red natives break down the walls and flood inside. The sounds of battle rage out of sight of the crew, but within a few minutes the army of red natives run out of the city, as the green natives unload one volley after another at the retreating reds. The crew returns to the ROV and, as they are leaving, they notice a small group of red natives watching them from the trees. They fade into the trees and disappear as the ROV pulls away.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareRedHelpAssault
description: Worried about friendly fire, the group stays close the to the red native’s leaders, serving as a makeshift body guard as they push through the streets of wood and thatch houses. They make their way to the central keep as groups of red soldiers fan out, kicking open doors and fighting in the streets.

The keep is a castle like fort made of carefully stacked stones and protected by layers of green firing down from the walled in rooftop. As the red forces reach the reinforced wooden doors of the keep, they bring forth a large tree trunk battering ram and begin smashing the door.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareGreenHelpDefendSuccess
description: The crew reaches the keep just as the remaining bulk of the now scattered red army breaks down its reinforced wooden doors. As the red marauders surge into the keep, they’re met with heavy resistance from the green defenders inside. The crew forms a firing line behind the assaulting red soldiers and starts hosing them down with rifle fire.

As the green soldiers push out from inside the keep the crew presses in from outside. Any red soldier that doesn’t flee is gunned down as the two groups meet just outside the opening of the keep. There’s a brief moment of tense apprehension as the crew comes face to face with the leaders of the green defenders, but after some discussion amongst the green natives they relax.

One of the well-dressed leaders of the green natives beckons for the crew to approach. She signals to one of the green soldiers. He runs off, reappearing moment later, dragging a large chest full of all kinds of supplies and treasure. The group graciously accepts. After spending some time helping the natives clean their battered town, the crew takes their loot and returns to the ROV.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareNope
description: The group decides it would be best if they don’t get involved where they don’t belong, instead choosing to stay and watch, mostly out of curiosity.

title: Tribal warfare
name: Warfare
description: After a quick rest, the group awoke to the unexpected sound of distant gunfire. Intrigued and concerned the group suited up, grabbed their guns, and headed towards the sound. They crosses over a small dirt path, into a patch of trees, then emerged into an open field and it didn’t take long to spot the source of the noise.

On the far side of the field was a large native settlement surrounded by a huge army of natives. As they draw close the battlefield begins to unfold. A large militia of red-skinned natives are sieging a large settlement of green-skinned natives. Both group possess crude matchlock muskets, surprising advanced technology for natives.

The group discussing joining the fight in hopes of reward or loot. Both teams seem equally matched. The red attackers are in the process of breaching the large wooden walls surrounding the settlement, but the green are holding their own at the moment.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareGreenHelpLate
description: As the crew enters the walls of the settlement, it becomes clear they are too late, as flames rise from many of the wood and thatch roofs and dark clouds of smoke fill the street. They waste no time heading for the keep, killing any stray red native they come across along the way.

They reach the keep and rush inside to find a small group of well-dressed natives making their last stand against a band of red raiders. Just as the red natives close in for the kill the crew opens fire, cutting the natives down where they stand. The well-dressed natives stare at the crew with a look of fear and surprise.

As the crew approaches the natives, their remaining guards ready their weapons, but the well-dressed leader natives order them to stand down. One of the green leaders steps forth and presents the group with a small chest of supplies, presumably as a reward for saving their lives. While it’s not much, the crew politely accepts, knowing the green natives just lost most of what they own. After a few hours of helping the green native try to piece things back together, the crew takes their loot and returns to the ROV.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareGreenHelp
description: The crew arrives just as the red natives’ army breeches the green natives’ wall. As the red natives begin to flood in the crew approaches them from behind, gunning down many of them as they enter the city though the small hole chopped into the wooden wall. The crew enter after the red natives, who are still mostly unaware of the crew’s counter attack.

title: Tribal warfare
name: WarfareGreenHelpDefendFail
description: By the time the crew reaches the keep the red army has already made its way inside. The crew enters to find much of the keep has been ransacked by the red marauders. The crew pass in the main chamber and finds a small band of red soldiers quickly advances on a small band of well-dressed green natives. The red natives draw their swords and move in for the kill, but the crew cuts them down in a burst of rifle fire. The crew looks around the keep and finds that most of the red natives have been killed in the assault.

The well-dressed natives, cowering from the crew at first, gingerly come out as they realize the crew means them no harm. One of the natives signals to another and they run off, returning moments later dragging a sizable chest full of various supplies and place it at the crew’s feet. The crew graciously accepts the gift and, after staying a few hours to help the natives search for survivors, the crew takes it reward and returns to the ROV.
